post.description: The service this method utilizes is set on a daily schedule. This endpoint exists to manually trigger the process.

401.description: 401 Unauthenticated or unauthorized. The API key might be missing or invalid (unauthenticated), or it might be at its usage limit (unauthorized). The response body will contain more info.

422.description: 422 One or more of the query params are invalid. The response body will contain more info.

429.description: 429 Requests are being sent too frequently - the request was throttled.

post.description: Allows staff to manually set the result of a prop (outcome), triggering prediction processing and leaderboard updates. The propId is the outcome_uuid from Goracle.

200.description: Prop result set successfully, predictions processed

post.summary: Manually set prop result

info.title: Khronos API Documentation
info.description: Khronos is a sports-focused API that integrates with my other app, Pluto for Discord.

commence_time.description: The start time of the matchup in ISO 8601 format.

last_update.description: The last update time of the matchup details in ISO 8601 format.

home_team_odds.description: Betting odds for the home team. Nullable.

away_team_odds.description: Betting odds for the away team. Nullable.

winner.description: The winner of the matchup. Nullable.

loser.description: The loser of the matchup. Nullable.

complete.description: Flag indicating if the match is complete.

dateofmatchup.description: The date of the matchup (e.g., 11/24/2023). Nullable.

legiblestart.description: A human-readable format of the start time (e.g., Tue, 8:00 PM). Nullable.

cron_timer.description: A cron format string representing the start time of the matchup. Nullable.

closing_bets.description: Flag indicating whether bets are in the process of being closed for this matchup. Defaults to false.

espn_id.description: ESPN ID for the matchup. Nullable.

created_at.description: The creation timestamp of the matchup.

guild_id.description: The unique identifier for the guild

setting_type.description: The type of setting for the Discord configuration

setting_value.description: The value associated with the setting

id.description: Unique identifier for the Discord configuration entry

guild_id.description: Guild ID associated with the setting

setting_value.description: Value of the setting. When the setting type is 'preferred_teams', it is a comma separated list. E.g, 'lakers,hawks'

config.description: Discord configurations associated with the guild

id.description: Unique identifier for the Discord configuration entry

guild_id.description: Guild ID associated with the setting

setting_value.description: Value of the setting. When the setting type is 'preferred_teams', it is a comma separated list. E.g, 'lakers,hawks'

message.default: All channels have been removed successfully

betid.description: The unique identifier for the betslip

userid.description: The user ID associated with the betslip

team.description: The team/player chosen in the bet

profit.description: The profit from the bet, if applicable

payout.description: The total payout from the bet, if applicable

guild_id.description: The Discord guild ID associated with the betslip

userid.description: The ID of the user placing the bet

team.description: The name of the team (or, player, etc) the user is betting on

amount.description: The amount the user is betting

guild_id.description: The guild id - The origin of where the bet was placed

matchup_id.description: The Identifier for a match. This is & must be provided if there's multiple matches for the team, and the user submits the specific match they want to bet on.

market_key.description: The market key for the bet

event_id.description: The event ID from the source API

userid.description: The user ID associated with the betslip

team.description: The team (or player) chosen in the bet

profit.description: The profit from the bet, if applicable

payout.description: The total payout from the bet, if applicable

opponent.description: Opposing team in the match the user has bet on

dateofmatchup.description: Date of the match the user has bet on

betslip.description: The data containing finalized betslip details -- This is sent back to the client (Pluto) for the user to confirm their betslip

guild_id.description: The guild id - The origin of where the bet was placed

matchup_id.description: The Identifier for a match. // aka event_id

market_key.description: The prop type the match & bet belongs to.

newBalance.description: The new balance after the bet amount change

payout.description: The total payout after the bet amount change

profit.description: The profit from the bet amount change

newBetAmount.description: The new amount of the bet after doubling.

newProfit.description: The profit expected if the bet wins, calculated based on the doubled bet amount.

newPayout.description: The total potential payout (original bet plus profit) if the bet wins.

newBalance.description: The new balance of the users account after the bet amount has been doubled and deducted.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who owns the bet.

betId.description: The unique identifier of the bet that has been doubled.

status.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

message.description: A message detailing the result of the operation.

betslip.description: The detailed information about the doubled betslip.

patreonOverride.description: Indicates if the Patreon override is enabled, which means the user is a Patreon member and in some cases, meets the required Patreon tier.

id.description: Unique identifier for the money record

isNewUser.description: Whether the user is new or not. This is flagged within the service if an account has to be created for them.

patreonOverride.description: Indicates if the Patreon override is enabled, which means the user is a Patreon member and in some cases, meets the required Patreon tier.

id.description: The unique identifier of the leaderboard entry

balance.description: The balance associated with the leaderboard entry

key.description: The unique key for the market
The unique key for the bookmaker

id.description: The unique identifier for the odds/match

choice.description: Who or what the user is betting/predicting on

predictions.description: Array of predictions for this event

id.description: Unique identifier for the processing record

processed_at.description: Timestamp of when the prediction was processed

status.description: Status of the processing. New records default to IN_PROGRESS

details.description: Any additional processing details or metadata

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the record was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the leaderboard entry

week_number.description: Week number relative to the system start

current_week.description: Current week number (only included for weekly time frame)

id.description: Unique identifier for the store item

description.example: A magical coin that brings luck to your bets

price.description: Price of the item in coins

is_available.description: Whether the item is currently available in the store

is_equippable.description: Whether the item can be equipped by users

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the item was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the item was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the inventory entry

user_id.description: User ID who owns the item

is_equipped.description: Whether the item is currently equipped/active

updated_at.description: Last time the item status was updated

count.description: The number of bets for the team

losses.description: The number of losses for the team

id.description: Unique identifier for the leaderboard entry

outcome_uuid.description: Unique identifier for the outcome in Goracle

result.description: Result of the outcome (team name, over/under, etc.)

actual_value.description: Actual statistical value for player props

correlation_id.description: Correlation ID for tracking webhook across systems

completed_at.description: Timestamp when the outcome was completed

name.description: Prop name (e.g., LeBron James Over 25.5 Points)

winner.description: The winning result/choice for the prop

status.description: Status of the prop after setting result

user_id.description: Discord user ID of the admin setting the result

count.description: Number of random props to return
